name: Jerky Lover's Jerky - Sweet, Hot and Spicy!
author: DIXYCHIK
summary: If you love hot and sweet we're confident this will be your favorite. An ultimate treat for family outings, sporting events, camping or hiking trips. Pineapple juice is the key that ties the flavors together. Go easy on the black and red pepper as the flavor goes a long ways!
ingredients: 2 teaspoons cracked black pepper, or to taste
1 pound lean beef sirloin tip, sliced into 1/8 inch strips
1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: In a small bowl or cup, mix together the onion powder, garlic powder, and some cracked black pepper
Season the meat lightly, using only part of the mixture
Place into an airtight plastic container or bowl, and refrigerate
In a saucepan over medium heat, mix together the brown sugar, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, Worcestershire sauce, balsamic vinegar, liquid smoke flavoring and pineapple juice
Heat until the brown sugar has completely dissolved
Pour cooled marinade over the seasoned meat, and mix by hand to coat
Seal the bowl, and refrigerate for at least 3 hours
Arrange the beef strips on the rack of a dehydrator, and sprinkle with a little bit more of the spice mixture and red pepper flakes if using
Dry for 5 hours, or to your desired dryness
